application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: G.22 Holly/Holme Oak - Crown lift to 3m from ground level over path.T.23 Western Red Cedar - 3m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points, deadwood & crown lift to 3m from ground level all round.G.12  Holly/Holme Oak - Lateral reduction to provide 2m clearance from buildings & reduce in height to match adjacent Yew.T.30 Ash - 2-3m Holistic crown reduction, reshape to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.31 Ash - 2-3m Holistic crown reduction, reshape to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.33 Lawson Cypress - Fell (Exempt).G.34 Lawson Cypress - Fell (Exempt).T.36 Silver Maple - 2-3m Holistic crown reduction, reshape to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.37 White Beam - 2m Holistic crown reduction, reshape to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.38 Holly - Fell (Exempt).Hedges, shrubs, bushes & those highlighted above are exempt from application.
